meta.meta_description: Find out how much $FOMO is ready to get burned. Stay updated on future burns to see how they will affect the token supply and value.

burned_value.title: Total FOMO supply reduced by 40.0%.
burned_value.description: 40,000,000,000 FOMO tokens have entered the void and will never re-enter the supply. The combined value of all tokens at the time of burning totaled $999,999. Average burn price: 0.006 $FOMO per WETH.

latest_burn.title: Latest Burn Details
latest_burn.last_burn: The last burn happened a week ago
latest_burn.description: In the most recent burn, a total of 400,000 FOMO tokens were burned. At the time of this burn, the cumulative value of the burned FOMO amounted to $4,000,000. This burn occurred on Saturday, May 25, 2024 and was triggered by 0x08B308c486D7B9A9f9DCac1A0dc80d9d523A6967.

questions.question: Why are $FOMO tokens burned?
questions.answer: Burning $FOMO tokens helps reduce the total supply, which can increase the value of the remaining tokens and benefit all holders.

questions.question: What are the sources of tokens that are burned?
questions.answer: Tokens are burned from various sources including transaction fees, staking rewards, and unused tokens.

questions.question: How do $FOMO token burns occur?
questions.answer: Burns occur by calling the burn() function on the $FOMO Burn Contract, which permanently removes the specified amount of tokens from circulation.

questions.question: How does burning $FOMO tokens benefit the community?
questions.answer: Burning tokens reduces supply, which can increase demand and value, benefiting token holders and supporting a healthier economy.

questions.question: Are $FOMO token burns a regular occurrence?
questions.answer: Yes, $FOMO token burns are scheduled regularly to maintain a balanced supply and demand dynamic.

questions.question: What effects do $FOMO token burns have on the market?
questions.answer: Burning tokens generally leads to a decrease in supply, which can drive up the price if demand remains constant or increases.
